channel.title: Client stuck on 'connecting to update server'
channel.description:
i have my server, but whenever i click on run it stuk on connecting to update server ?
what is the problem ? what do i need to do ?
please help me :(

item.title: Client stuck on 'connecting to update server'
item.dc:creator: @Sexii_Jadii Sexii Jadii
item.description:
@Sexii_Jadii wrote:

[quote=“davidi2, post:9, topic:298620”][quote author=Sexii Jadii link=topic=395007.msg2935400#msg2935400 date=1251526878]

Title fixed and topic moved to correct section.

Thankyou Taharok, I’m glad i’m helping the community
[/quote]

Suck up much? Wanna be mod… Tharok did it by himself…

And yes its a 508. Your cache is on wrong spot, please follow the tutorials correctly.[/quote]

Actually i reported the topic for being wrongly titled and in wrong section…

Gf?
